thread.title: M Goggin
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by M Goggin

author: M Goggin
title: M Goggin
text: I googled "Joseph Ribkoff on sale" and your homepage appeared. It has made my month! Youve a great selection. This Cork gal will be back shopping with ye online. Service couldnt have been more efficient. It came within 2 days, a handwritten card was included with personal note as requested, good price. Expand to Cork please!
